response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. Given its significance, I believe it deserves a home where it can be appreciated fully. For this exceptional piece, I am offering it at a special price of $750,000. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details with you soon.", "product_price": 750000}
